thread.title: Beyoncé's Maternity Style Is On Point In This Pale Pink Outfit
thread.title_full: Beyoncé's Maternity Style Is On Point In This Pale Pink Outfit

title: Beyoncé's Maternity Style Is On Point In This Pale Pink Outfit
text: On top of her flawless jacket, Bey's makeup was also perfectly pink, as evidenced in another selfie captured from her Snapchat to the Beylite Instagram . Loading View on Instagram It's clear Beyoncé is the leader of the pack when it comes to styling this muted blush shade, but it happens to be one of this spring's most prevalent and wearable trends . For instance, it's the exact hue of Rihanna’s recently launched Fenty x Puma bow slides , the follow-up to her immensely popular fur slides (which sold out in less than 24 hours when they launched in April 2016). The dusty rose shade is even making its rounds in the beauty world, as evidenced by ColourPop’s new (and super Instagrammable) Pink Collection. The takeaway: it's time to get your hands on some pale pink ASAP. Of course, since the Beyhive is on baby watch, it's only a matter of time before fans begin speculating that the star's girly get-up could be a nod to her babies' gender (last week, many guessed that the earrings she wore to Richard Lawson's 70th birthday party implied the babies will be boys). Whether or not the rumors prove true will be revealed in time--all I can say for certain is: as far Beyoncé's maternity style goes, she's still the queen. All hail.
